items.text:
From amidst the chaos of the reclaimers entering the swamp, you
hear a yell and see a brightly colored figure making his way toward
you. After disappearing after the flood all those days ago, it looks like
Aell made his way to the marsh.

“What is happening?” he exclaims. “After last time, I’m a bit nervous
about my powers, but I can try to help you the best I can.”
